name: Zhongli
description: A mysterious guest invited by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

skills.name: Rain of Stone
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 6 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the gronud below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Dominus Lapidis
skills.description:
Every mountain, rock, and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between.

Press: Commands the omnipresent power of the earth to solidify into a Stone Stele, standing 30 seconds, dealing AoE Geo DMG at the creation.
Once per 2 seconds, the Stone Stele will resonate with the nearby Geo Constructs, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.
The Stone Stele is considered a Geo Construct, and can both be climbed and used to block attacks. Only one Stele may exist at any one time.
Hold: Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects:

  • Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP, and absorbs Geo DMG 250% more effectively.
  • Causes AoE Geo DMG.
  • If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG.

When hit at least one opponent, the Stone Stele creation and the Resonance generate 0.5 elemental particles.

skills.name: Planet Befall
skills.description:
Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them.

Petrification: Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.

passives.name: Resonant Waves
passives.description:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:
  • Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.
    Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

passives.name: Dominance of Earth
passives.description: Planet Befall deals additional DMG equal to 33% of Zhongli's Max HP.

passives.name: Arcanum of Crystal
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Polearm-type weapons.

constellations.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously to 2.

constellations.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.description: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.description: Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Planet Befall by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.description: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character. A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.
